scripts.maria:up: docker run --rm -p 3306:3306 --name local-maria -e MYSQL_DATABASE=slapi -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=admin -d mariadb && sleep 5
scripts.test:int:maria: mocha --exit --timeout 99999 -r ts-node/register test/int/initQuery.spec.ts test/int/database.spec.ts test/int/e2e.spec.ts || echo 'failed?'
